reviews.negative_text:
Nous sommes restées 3 nuits et dès la première, la clim s'est mise à couler (comme si on versait un seau d'eau sur le plancher!) vers 4h du matin, m'obligeant à me lever pour mettre des serviettes et ainsi contenir le dégât d'eau. Le matin, j'en ai informé la première personne que j'ai vue, à savoir la femme de ménage. C'est elle qui a "géré" le problème en me disant plus tard qu'ils avaient appelé quelqu'un pour venir réparer. La nuit suivante, rebelote : la clim se remet à couler en pleine nuit. 3eme nuit pareil. Ce n'est que le jour de notre départ que le réparateur est arrivé.
Des problèmes de ce genre, ça arrive. Que les réparateurs de clim soient débordés l'été quand il fait très chaud, je comprends. Ce qui passe très mal c'est le fait que le proprio n'est jamais venu nous parler, nous n'avons eu aucune proposition pour changer de chambre, et encore moins un geste de la part de l'établissement (genre les petits-déjeuners offerts ou une quelconque compensation...). 
C'était la 3ème fois que j'allais dans cet hotel, et ça sera la dernière...

reviews.review_title: Beachfront hotel in a great village
reviews.positive_text:
Beautiful location overlooking the beach. Our room was at the front and we could hear the sound of the sea.
It’s a 3 star property, perhaps a little over priced, but it was clean and what we needed.
Great beach bar, lovely comfortable seating but service could have been better.

reviews.review_title: fun hotel in a fun place
reviews.positive_text: Lovely room overlooking the beach with a nice interior and a comfy bed.  The shower cabin is exactly as described - a pre-formed cabin in the corner of the room but it's clean and functional.  Great view of the Bastille Day fireworks on the beach!
reviews.negative_text: Yet again I find myself in a hotel room that has room for a chair and a desk/table but no dressing table.  Why oh why don't they put a mirror on the wall behind the said desk/table so I can sit and put my make up on, do my hair etc?

reviews.positive_text: Location and friendly staff , they were a pleasure , great sense of a team
Location
reviews.negative_text: Tiny room and bathroom. Too close to the restaurant, making it too noisy. Breakfast was terrible. We were invited to pay for the beach hammocks...

reviews.review_title: We loved everything about Our stay here and very much look forward to come stay again 😊
reviews.positive_text:
We loved Our stay here 😊 We were very warmly welcomed 🌸 to this traditional french stone home in nature 🌺 it was great to jump into the pool after a long days drive and chill in the communal space And breakfast was Great with home made jams, yogurt and fruit from there garden, We loved this touch 😊
Situated near Cordes Sur Ciel perfect location.
We very much look forward to come back and stay again 🙌🏽🌸🙌🏽
Lovely location, friendly

reviews.review_title: It was expensive (for what it was) and nothing special.
reviews.positive_text: The location
reviews.negative_text: The staff. The fact that it took 20 minutes and repeated reminders before anyone turned up to the front desk to check us in. The cost. The two beds crammed into a room only big enough for one. The minuscule and expensive breakfast, which generated 20+ pieces of plastic litter.

reviews.review_title: Great hotel, great food. No parking on site and as a very popular resort it was difficult to find a space. We were lucky
reviews.positive_text: Great hotel with seafood restaurant and bar. We sat on the beachside tables and enjoyed a lovely meal. The oysters were fantastic. Rooms were clean with air conditioning which was needed at this time of year(August).
reviews.negative_text: Property was fine and the breakfast was very enjoyable.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful location, comfy beds, great breakfast - what else is there to want 👍
reviews.positive_text: Location, location, location! Was fabulous! Right on the amazing beach.
reviews.negative_text: Parking was tricky but we were staying over a weekend so to be expected.

reviews.positive_text: Wonderful hotel and the staff were so friendly and accommodating.  We had a lovely room overlooking the beach with lovely facilities and a great restaurant.

reviews.review_title: Grata sorpresa este pequeño hotel frente a una playa muy buena.
reviews.positive_text: Ubicación muy buena frente a la playa. Todo muy nuevo dentro de la habitación. Restaurantes y todos los servicios muy cerca para mayor coodidad.
reviews.negative_text: Como recomendación les diría que mejoraran el tema de olor a comida en las zonas comunes que van a las habitaciones, ya que al estar el restaurante debajo, hay un olor muy fuerte a cocina/comida en el pasillo y zonas que van a las habitaciones. Por lo demás todo perfecto.

reviews.review_title: Bonito pero Ruidoso y desayuno KO
reviews.positive_text: La ubicación y el entorno son geniales. La cama es comoda y la habitación es limpia. Los aires acondicionados nuevos y el lavabo reformado.
reviews.negative_text:
Hay dos cosas que se podrian mejorar. De hecho 3.

Por un lado el desayuno. Es muy escaso. Pan y croissants que cambiaban cada dia con una tarrinita de nutella (no apta para alérgicos, otra de mermelada, otra de miel y una pastilla de manteiquilla. Sin opción a nada más.

El servicio del desayuno, en general era lento.

Pero bueno. Lo que si que fue un KO rotundo fue el ruido de la noche. Este local más que un hotel con restaurante y terraza es y restauranta y terraza con 8 habitaciones justo encima de la cocina y justo encima de donde l@s camarer@s dejan los platos: gritos, golpes, platos caídos, etc; hasta las 2 de la madrugada que hacía dificil dormir.

reviews.positive_text: De locatie. Heel leuk plekje aan het strand. Heerlijk eten en leuk jong personeel.
reviews.negative_text: Bed was niet best. Herrie vanuit de keuken.

reviews.positive_text: Lokatie
reviews.negative_text: Voor één persoon is het bed perfect. 140/190 Voor 2 te klein

reviews.positive_text: La ubicación es inmejorable y la terraza comedor en primera linea de playa. Sirven muy rápido.
reviews.negative_text: Habitación pequeña.

reviews.positive_text:
Die Lage direkt am Strand war toll. Es gab am Strand entlang eine Menge an Restaurants und Bars. 
Das Zimmer war sehr sauber und schön eingerichtet.
reviews.negative_text:
Bei der Buchung hatten wir keine Idee, was mit einer Duschkabine gemeint ist. Im Zimmer  war eine eingebaute Nasszelle, die immer sehr sauber war, allerdings sehr klein. Für unsere Zwecke ok.
Das Zimmer lag über dem Restaurant und war recht hellhörig.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double avec Cabine de Douche - Vue sur Mer

reviews.positive_text: Unschlagbare Lage direkt am Strand und knapp 15 Minuten zu Fuß vom Bahnhof. Unweit vom Wochenmarkt und auch kurze Distanz zu Supermarkt & diversen Restaurants, sofern man nicht im Hause essen möchte. Sehr sauber, freundliches Personal. Super Beach Bar.
reviews.negative_text: Qualität des Frühstücks war nicht überzeugend, lieber in Höhe des Marktes in eines der Cafés gehen. Fliegen‘- und Mückenschutz an den Fenstern wäre toll.  Stuhl & Toilettenbrille waren schon etwas mitgenommen und sollten ausgetauscht werden.
